featured.text: Many folk tales are also tall tales—stories of unbelievable events told with perfect seriousness.
The soybean is an almost perfect source of protein.
However, because different people behave differently when lying, a polygraph test is by no means perfect.

definition.zh_def: 完美的，沒有缺陷或不足的。
definition.en_def: Having all the required qualities or characteristics; flawless.
definition.example: She delivered a perfect performance at the concert.
